name: Tuhin Dutt
bio: Tuhin is a late blooming Tennis enthusiast, who often finds himself with a twisted ankle every time he tries to pull off a Nadal on clay. On relatively safer days he is actively working on dode algorithms, math and physics problems, and teaching creative problems solving to an eager bunch of students. Tuhin believes that anyone with a passion for learning can build coding and tech skills.  At Tekjump, his vision is to provide skill development opportunities for anyone seeking a software development career launchpad.
